title: Joyent SmartOS DTrace DOF Out-Of-Bounds Write Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on vulnerable installations of Joyent SmartOS. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the DTrace DOF files. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of user-supplied data, which can result in a write past the end of an allocated object. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code under the context of the host OS.
addtionnal_details: Joyent has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://help.joyent.com/hc/en-us/articles/360000608188
timeline:
2017-10-12 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2018-03-07 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2018-03-07 - Advisory Updated
